https://www.youtube.com/18b092de-4ec2-4 ... ce799221b0
https://trackhat.org/trackhat-plus/
The TrackHat plus is finally here.
This excellent head tracking peripheral is the first wireless head tracking cap on the market, and comes with some astonishing stats.
the Lithium Polymer 1 amp battery will get an amazing 10 hour battery life, while conveniently tucked away at the back of the unit.
It is recharged with any Micro USB connection, and comes with a 1.8 metre micro USB cable, which can charge the device while it is being used.
Compatible with the TrackIR sensor, it makes an excellent trackir vector clip alternative.
2 status LEDs let you know when your device needs to be charged, and what the charge level is.
